feed.title: What's Up Docker? Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.0.2
entry.content:
Release notes: - :star: Add watcher placeholder visible to trigger templates
- :fire: Fix support for application/vnd.oci.image.index.v1+json manifests - :fire: [HUB] Fix images from Docker hub prepended with docker.io/

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.1.0
entry.content:
• :star: [Docker / Docker-compose trigger] - Allow to prune old versions (except current one and candidate one)
  • :star: [Apprise] - Add support for Apprise persistent yaml configuration
  • :star: [MQTT] - Prefix client id with wud_ instead of the generic mqttjs_ prefix
  • :star: [UI] - Focus login input field on page load
  • :star: Upgrade all dependencies
  • :star: Reduce docker image size
  • :fire: [GHCR] - Fix bearer authentication (username is not needed anymore)
  • :fire: [GHCR] - Fix anonymous authentication
  • :fire: [PUSHOVER] - Allow to set needed expire, retry properties when priority=2

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.1.1
entry.content: • :fire: [Docker watcher] - Fix manifest not found error on arm64 images when no variant is defined

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.2.0
entry.content:
• :star: [MQTT] - Add home-assistant global sensors (number of containers, number of containers to update...)
  • :star: [TELEGRAM] - Add Telegram trigger

entry.title: New release for What's Up Docker?: 6.3.0
entry.content:
• :star: [GITEA] - Add support for Gitea registries
  • :star: [FORGEJO] - Add support for Forgejo registries
  • :star: [GCR] - Allow anonymous access (for public images)
  • :star: [DISCORD] - Add Discord trigger
  • :star: [UI] - Add dark mode
  • :star: Upgrade all dependencies
